title: Bug 10654: Allow all jars in a folder to be added to build path
description: Bug 10654: Allow all jars in a folder to be added to build path
OB: When adding jar files to the build path using classpath variables, you have to specify each jar file separately, even if there are several in the same directory.
EB: The software should allow adding all jar files in a folder to the build path using classpath variables, eliminating the need to specify each file separately when there are multiple jar files in the same directory.
SR: To reproduce the issue, add jar files to the build path using classpath variables in a directory containing multiple jar files. Notice that each jar file has to be specified separately instead of being able to add all jar files in the directory at once.
